invocations.description: Returns the amount of monsters around you within distance range. If range is 0 or not specified, the entire screen is considered. Optionally, you can specify as many names as you want to only be considered as the following namex parameters.
invocations.ex:
auto(200)
if maround(0, 'rat', 'cave rat') > 0 then
	closeclient()
end
invocations.exDescription: Will close the client if there are any rats or cave rats around you.
